ext_description.p: An Interconnect_module_stratum_based_terminal is a type of . An Interconnect_module_stratum_based_terminal identifies both the design object and the stratum surface related to the object in the design organization. This allows the use of the terminal in a component instance where surfaces are joined. It also supports placement of embedded components. An Interconnect_module_stratum_based_terminal includes the identification of a reference surface to support the sequence of application of an embedded component or of material buildup.
ext_description.note: The Interconnect_module_stratum_based_terminal is an artifact that is defined in the design organization but generally will be assigned to only those lands or non_functional_lands that are intended to be penetrated with plated passages in the final product. This is only used in the case where sequential stackups are defined, and is derived from knowledge of the substrate design and intended lamination sequence. The other usage is for support of embedded components being connected into the succeeding stratum.

ext_description.p: An Interconnect_module_component_stratum_based_terminal is a type of included to support the case where explicit Interconnect_module_component_terminals are being connected by an as part of a sequential laminate assembly view for design or analysis purposes.
ext_description.note: A sequential laminate assembly description may be necessary to support embedded discrete components.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: the definition specifies the role of the for the Interconnect_module_component_stratum_based_terminal.

ext_description.p: An Interconnect_module_product_assembly_view_fabrication_joint specifies the bond among which is created during an assembly process. The detailed process description of how to create the bond is not included.
ext_description.note: This Application Object is intended to support a limited view of an interconnect product where the vertical or sequential arrangement of intermediate assemblies is of interest, and the detailed information available in is not of interest.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: a joined_terminal specifies the for the Interconnect_module_product_assembly_view_fabrication_joint. There shall be one or more for the Interconnect_module_product_assembly_view_fabrication_joint.
